pages.text: $(li)Just Enough Items is a very useful mod that will help you during all your journey.$(br)$(li)This mod basically helps you to know how to find or craft any item.$(br)$(li)Just press the E key in your keyboard to access to your inventory and the JEI interface.
$(li)On the top right you can see the number of pages and you can use the right and left arrows to change between pages.
$(li)On the bottom right you can see a Settings button and a Search Box. Just write the name of the desired item.
$(li)To see the recipe of an specific item, just left click on it. You will see all the different ways to get that item.
$(li)If you want to get all the different recipes you can make with an item, you have to place the mouse over the desired item and press the U key.
$(li)You can save an item in your Bookmark section placing the mouse over the desired item and press the A key.
$(li)The bookmarks interface can be found in the top left corner. Just press the Bookmarks button placed on the botton left corner to hide it.
$(li)Finally, if you want to hide the interface you only have to press the Control + O keys in your keyboard. Do the same to show it again.
